name: Marching in Place
long_desc: Stand upright and march in place, lifting your knees as high as comfortably possible.

name: Step Touches
long_desc: Step to the side with one foot and then bring the other foot to meet it, tapping the floor lightly.

name: Arm Swings
long_desc: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Swing arms forward and up, then swing them back and down in a rhythmic motion.

name: Shuffle Steps
long_desc: Take a small step to the side, followed by a quick 'shuffle' step with the other foot to meet the first. Alternate sides.

name: Standing Oblique Crunches
long_desc: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Place hands behind the head and bring the elbow towards the same side's knee. Return to starting position and repeat on the other side.

name: Modified Jumping Jacks
long_desc: Start with feet together. Step one foot out to the side and raise arms overhead. Step foot back in and lower arms. Repeat on the other side.

name: Torso Twists
long_desc: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Twist the torso to one side, then the other, keeping feet planted.

name: Heel Taps
long_desc: While standing, bend one knee and tap the heel in front of you, then switch to the other leg in a rhythmic manner.
